item.title: About Vue.js
item.description:
About Vue.js

Vue (pronounced /vjuː/, like view) is a progressive framework for building user interfaces. Unlike other monolithic frameworks, Vue is designed from the ground up to be incrementally adoptable. The core library is focused on the view layer only, and is easy to pick up and integrate with other libraries or existing projects.

item.title: About SpringDataJPA
item.description:
About SpringDataJPA

Spring Data JPA, part of the larger Spring Data family, makes it easy to easily implement JPA based repositories. This module deals with enhanced support for JPA based data access layers. It makes it easier to build Spring-powered applications that use data access technologies.

item.title: About Spring Boot
item.description:
Spring Boot

Spring Boot makes it easy to create stand-alone, production-grade Spring based Applications that you can “just run”.

item.title: About Maven
item.description:
About Maven

Apache Maven is a software project management and comprehension tool. Based on the concept of a project object model (POM), Maven can manage a project’s build, reporting and documentation from a central piece of information.

item.title: About Flask
item.description:
Flask

Flask is a micro web framework written in Python. It is classified as a microframework because it does not require particular tools or libraries.

item.title: About Go
item.description:
Go

Go started in September 2007 when Robert Griesemer, Ken Thompson, and I began discussing a new language to address the engineering challenges we and our colleagues at Google were facing in our daily work.

item.title: About MeCab
item.description:
About MeCab

MeCab is an open-source text segmentation library for use with text written in the Japanese language originally developed by the Nara Institute of Science and Technology and currently maintained by Taku Kudou (工藤拓) as part of his work on the Google Japanese Input project.[1][2] The name derives from the developer’s favorite food, mekabu [ja] (和布蕪), a Japanese dish made from wakame leaves.
